# gradient decent 
m = 0
c = 0

epochs = 2000
l = 0.027 # learning rate
n = len(X)
# D_c = 0
for i in range(epochs):
    y_pred = m*X + c
    D_m = (-2/n) * np.sum(X * (Y - y_pred))    
    D_c = (-2/n) * sum( Y - y_pred )
    m = m - l* D_m    
    c = c - l* D_c

m, c
